scripts.fingerprint:android: npx expo-updates fingerprint:generate --platform android | jq -r '.hash' | xargs -n 1 echo 'fingerprint:'
scripts.fingerprint:ios: npx expo-updates fingerprint:generate --platform ios | jq -r '.hash' | xargs -n 1 echo 'fingerprint:'
scripts.build:debug:ios: cd ios && pod install && cd .. && xcodebuild ONLY_ACTIVE_ARCH=YES -workspace ios/RnSetupCiYarnFlat.xcworkspace -UseNewBuildSystem=YES -scheme RnSetupCiYarnFlat -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -quiet
